# Application Configuration
# Generated from Jinja template

[database]
host = {{ db.host }}
port = {{ db.port }}
username = {{ db.username }}
database = {{ db.name }}

[server]
host = {{ server.host }}
port = {{ server.port }}
workers = {{ server.workers }}
debug = {{ 'true' if server.debug else 'false' }}

[features]
{% for feature in features %}
{{ feature.name }} = {{ 'enabled' if feature.enabled else 'disabled' }}
{% endfor %}

[api_endpoints]
{% for endpoint in api_endpoints %}
{{ endpoint.name }} = {{ endpoint.url }}
{% endfor %}

# Environment: {{ environment }}
# Version: {{ version }}
# Generated: {{ timestamp }}
